cves.description: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts, Client-Side Enforcement of Server-Side Security, Reliance on Untrusted Inputs in a Security Decision vulnerability in Turkguven Software Technologies Inc. Perfektive allows Brute Force, Authentication Bypass, Functionality Bypass.This issue affects Perfektive: before Version: 12574 Build: 2701.
problemType: CWE-307 Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts
CWE-602 Client-Side Enforcement of Server-Side Security
CWE-807 Reliance on Untrusted Inputs in a Security Decision
